name: iQuinceSoft Consulting Services Pvt. Ltd.
description:
iQuinceSoft is a technology company that works in Web Domain, Mobile platforms, SEO, and Designing. iQuinceSoft delivers tangible business benefits with the reliability, robustness, and scalability that the customer demands. We provide consultancy and services in the field of software development and also towards optimizing the business solution onto the web and mobile platform.
Our team consists of designers and programmers with expertise in Mobile Application Development like iPhone, Android, Open Source (PHP, Joomla, Zencart, OsCommerce, Wordpress) and Framework (Cakephp, Laravel, Zend). We are a dedicated team with customer focus, to achieve this we follow a strict SDLC that leads to increased customer acceptance towards a product, as well as long lasting relations with our clients. We maintain regular communications throughout the project in order to ensure we are directly on track with your specifications and deliver on time.
